article: venezuela has the chance wednesday to accelerate what president hugo chavez terms a `` peaceful revolution , '' or to reject what his opponents say would be a constitutional dictatorship benefiting chavez at the expense of the millions of poor citizens he says he represents .
abstract: a divided venezuela to vote on new constitution
